name: mobile-provisions
title: Mobile Provisions
description: Manage and inspect Apple mobile provisioning profiles with detailed information about certificates, entitlements, and provisioned devices
author: ernest0n

commands.name: show-mobile-provisions
commands.title: Show Mobile Provisions
commands.description: Browse and manage all installed .mobileprovision files with detailed information, search, and bulk actions

commands.name: dump-provision-profile
commands.title: Dump Provision Profile
commands.description: Inspect a specific .mobileprovision file by providing its file path

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
